name: Serenade
description: With the sweet and love night time, write a fantasy serenade for you.

name: Sert's Coin
description: A coin engraved with the challenger's name. It symbolizes honor and strength for dueling clubs.

name: Server Launch Lucky Bag
description: New Server Lucky Bag. Open to get a mysterious gift.

name: Seven-colored Sunlight
description: Sunlight has 7 colors whose Trial can only be occasionally captured after rain.

name: Sewer Material Pack
description: Sewer Material Pack, in which all kinds of Sewer materials can be found.

name: Shackles [1]
description: This item is to handcuff criminals and slaves' feet so that prevent them from escaping. The heavy stuff on ankles makes them difficult to move.

name: Shackles [2]
description: This item is to handcuff criminals and slaves' feet so that prevent them from escaping. The heavy stuff on ankles makes them difficult to move.

name: Shadow Guar [1]
description: Black shields that can be equipped on arms.

name: Shadow Guar [2]
description: Black shields that can be equipped on arms.

name: Shadow Sand
description: When you face yourself from the future, can you recognize "yourself"? The flowing sand will not tell you the answer. No matter how hard you try, it will be scattered from your palm. Maybe that is the fate...

name: Shadow Walk [1]
description: Boots made with dark spells to blend the user into darkness. Mage who made the boots enables the boots to protect the users in face of crisis.

name: Shadow Walk [2]
description: Boots made with dark spells to blend the user into darkness. Mage who made the boots enables the boots to protect the users in face of crisis.

name: Shaking Deviruchi
description: Bad news! To go against Year Beast, they will sacrifice Deviruchi to a worship ceremony! For love and to go against the evil, please save him!

name: Shattering snow·Blue Guardian
description: Heavy shield covered in Cold Iron, it keeps emitting Chill blue light and a freezing aura.

name: Shattering snow·Crimson Freeze
description: Magical dagger that emit freezing power, when wielded it will become the roaring snowstorm and freeze victim's soul and body .

name: Shattering snow·Everending Snow
description: Jur made by rare Ice crystal, the ice Core's blue fire burns ever bright.

name: Shattering snow·Freezing Breath
description: Spear made from icy Dragon breath and ice crystal, every thrust is powerful like the burning yet freezing breath of the ice dragons.
